thread.section_title: Madison Hotel by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, comfortable rooms, quiet.
thread.title_full: Good location, comfortable rooms, quiet. - Review of Madison Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Amy P
title: Good location, comfortable rooms, quiet.
text:
We had a one-night stay here during a busy trip and the St. Germain location is great. Walking distance and close to the Metro, Madison Hotel is ideally located. Many good bistros nearby as well.
Rooms were tiny, but spotless, well-designed, and modern. Staff was helpful. Breakfast seemed a bit on the expensive side, so we took a pass and grabbed something locally. For being so centrally located, the room was incredibly quiet (we had a room on the courtyard).
